data.text:
room - 521

good points

the best part - we were upgraded to family suite from the regular suite that we had booked.

1. room is large & comfortable.
2. breakfast spread  is good.
3. 10mins walking distance from mashreq metro station & 15mins walking distance from mall of emirates.
4. very polite & courteous staff.
5. 

not so good points
1. room over looks the adjoining hotel.
2. though the breakfast spread is good but its the same most of the days. so you run out of options if you staying for long.
3. the pool is not heated (atleast for asians temperature requirement) since its on the terrace, it gets colder with the breeze blowing. even after several request they could not get the heater working which was The Major Bummer.
4. the shower cubicle in the room is tad bit small, so Plus size guest will have challenges in the space :)

keep up the good work team novotel. thank you for making our stay so pleasant & comfortable. cheers
data.title: comfortable stay

data.text:
The overall experience was absolutely fantastic . From the house keeping staff, to the restaurant staff where we used to have breakfast , the security personnel and also the swimming pool staff and also the ppl at the reception.  We were received by the staff at the reception in an enthusiastic way every time . Felt like home honestly . Super spacious rooms and a very supportive team made our stay very memorable . 

A special mention to Mr Hatem who always was there for us and tried to do everything he could 
To fulfill all our demands. He was awesome .

Mr Nyinyi from the reception was very sweet tooo  and so also Mr Ajay .

Chef Rakesh made fantastic omelettes every morning, honestly the best I have had so far.

Miss Reena from security team was very good too and took good care of our kids when they would move around all by themselves . 

Thanks guys for a great experience!!!!
data.title: Brilliant location , right next to the mall of emirates ... great team, super warm and friendly staff

data.text:
Pros - Excellent service and very polite staff .. special shout out for Maryam , Ajay the restaurant manager and the staff at the breakfast counter 
location - nice places around to eat with options for different cuisines 
Cleanliness 
Staff was always willing to accommodate all requests 
A family suite is a very good idea for a family of 4, make sure you have a packed itinerary since there is nothing to do in the hotel 

Cons 
Nothing to do for children apart from a PS 5 installed in the lobby area .. 
TV channels are very limited 
Breakfast was absolutely the same for  all 7 days that we were there .. pls add some variety to the same 
Very small shower area 

Thank you to the entire team for making our stay memorable
data.title: Dubai the city of miracles
